mapper.insert: INSERT INTO minimember (memberid, password, name, phone, email) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{password}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{email})
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM minimember WHERE memberid = #{param1} AND password = #{param2}
mapper.update: UPDATE minimember SET password = #{password}, name = #{name}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email} WHERE memberid = #{memberId}
